quiz.title: Calculus Implicit Function Rule (Quiz 12)
quiz.subtitle: Implicit Function Rule Differentiation Practice (10 Questions)
quiz.subject: Calculus

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(x^2y^3 + \sin y = 4\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 2xy³ + 3x²y²·dy/dx + cos y·dy/dx = 0 → (3x²y² + cos y)·dy/dx = -2xy³ → dy/dx = -2xy³/(3x²y² + cos y)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(e^{xy} + x^2 = y\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: e^(xy)(y + x·dy/dx) + 2x = dy/dx → ye^(xy) + xe^(xy)·dy/dx + 2x = dy/dx → (xe^(xy) - 1)·dy/dx = -2x - ye^(xy) → dy/dx = (2x + ye^(xy))/(xe^(xy) - 1)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(\ln(x + y) = xy\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: (1 + dy/dx)/(x+y) = y + x·dy/dx → 1 + dy/dx = (x+y)(y + x·dy/dx) → dy/dx = [y(x+y) - 1]/[1 - x(x+y)]

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(x^2\sin y + y^2\cos x = 10\)
options: \(\frac{2x\sin y - y^2\sin x}{2y\cos x - x^2\cos y}\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 2x·sin y + x²·cos y·dy/dx - y²·sin x + 2y·cos x·dy/dx = 0 → (x²·cos y + 2y·cos x)·dy/dx = y²·sin x - 2x·sin y → dy/dx = (y²·sin x - 2x·sin y)/(x²·cos y + 2y·cos x)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(x^3 + y^3 = 3xy\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 3x² + 3y²·dy/dx = 3y + 3x·dy/dx → 3y²·dy/dx - 3x·dy/dx = 3y - 3x² → (y² - x)·dy/dx = y - x² → dy/dx = (y - x²)/(y² - x)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(xe^y + ye^x = 5\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: e^y + xe^y·dy/dx + e^x·dy/dx + ye^x = 0 → (xe^y + e^x)·dy/dx = -e^y - ye^x → dy/dx = -(e^y + ye^x)/(xe^y + e^x)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(\sin(xy) = x + y\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: cos(xy)(y + x·dy/dx) = 1 + dy/dx → y·cos(xy) + x·cos(xy)·dy/dx = 1 + dy/dx → (x·cos(xy) - 1)·dy/dx = 1 - y·cos(xy) → dy/dx = (1 - y·cos(xy))/(x·cos(xy) - 1)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(y^2\ln x + x^2\ln y = 5\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 2y·ln x·dy/dx + y²/x + 2x·ln y + x²/y·dy/dx = 0 → (2y·ln x + x²/y)·dy/dx = -2x·ln y - y²/x → dy/dx = -2x·ln y/(2y·ln x + x²/y)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(x^2 + y^2 + \tan(xy) = 4\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 2x + 2y·dy/dx + sec²(xy)(y + x·dy/dx) = 0 → (2y + x·sec²(xy))·dy/dx = -2x - y·sec²(xy) → dy/dx = -(2x + y·sec²(xy))/(2y + x·sec²(xy))

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(x^2y + y^3e^x = 7\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 2xy + x²·dy/dx + 3y²e^x·dy/dx + y³e^x = 0 → (x² + 3y²e^x)·dy/dx = -2xy - y³e^x → dy/dx = -(2xy + y³e^x)/(x² + 3y²e^x)

scoreMessages.90: Excellent work! You have mastered advanced implicit differentiation with multiple rules.
scoreMessages.70: Good job! You understand most implicit differentiation concepts but could use some review of combined rules.
scoreMessages.50: Not bad! Review the implicit differentiation applications with product, chain, and trigonometric rules you missed.
scoreMessages.0: Keep practicing! Focus on understanding implicit differentiation with exponential, logarithmic, and trigonometric functions.
